name: Grinsley Jam
description:
Chilis, spices, and spicy seeds aren’t enough to wake you up from the dreamlike journey you can share with Grinsley as you help him slaughter enemies with rocks, ice, and fire. A prequel to the upcoming classic of the same name.

It's freakin' Grinsley.

Controls:

  • Enter - Select menu option.
  • Arrows / WASD - Move and jump.
  • R - Restart.
  • Escape - Exit to menu.
